hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Sa'eed bin Al-Mu'alla said:"We used to go to the marketplace in the morning at the time of the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ), and we would pass through the Masjid and pray there

chapter.ara-name: باب صَلاَةِ الَّذِي يَمُرُّ عَلَى الْمَسْجِدِ
chapter.eng-name: The Prayer Of One Who Is Passing Through The Masjid
